definition: Heshun county in Jinzhong 晉中|晋中[Jin4 zhong1], Shanxi
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable
Heshun county in Jinzhong 晉中|晋中[Jin4 zhong1], Shanxi

sentences.english: Loving you is the softest suspense.
sentences.chinese: 愛您是否最和順的賞格。

sentences.english: Waiting out the rain in a dry goods shop in the center of Heshun's old town.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲人們在和順古鎮中心的一家食品店裏等待雨停。

sentences.english: For whom will your sweet body bloom?
sentences.chinese: 你那和順的情絮將會對誰綻放呢？

sentences.english: And we wish peace and safety for the world.
sentences.chinese: 並祈求天下和順，一切平安吉祥。

sentences.english: Many of these compounds are coloured and paramagnetic (see paramagnetism) and (as do the metals themselves) often act as catalysts.
sentences.chinese: 其中許多是有色金屬和順磁體，往往可用作催化劑。

sentences.english: Mr. White tenderly embraced his wife.
sentences.chinese: 懷特先生和順地擁抱了妻子。

sentences.english: Ethnic and religious harmony is a cultural heritage that Yunnan presents to the world.
sentences.chinese: 民族和諧，宗教和順，是雲南貢獻給世界的文化景觀。

sentences.english: Heshun is honored with the oldest international business brand in Yunnan Province.
sentences.chinese: 和順擁有云南最古老的跨國商號。

sentences.english: Heshun, a small township in west Yunnan, has favorable climatic and geographic conditions and unity of people.
sentences.chinese: 和順，一座滇西小鎮，佔盡了天時地利人和。

sentences.english: Heshun library is China's best village library.
sentences.chinese: 和順還擁有中國最好的鄉村圖書館。

sentences.english: Plum Road Heshun Long Bets is what we want to adopt tactics.
sentences.chinese: 梅花路和順龍投注纔是我們所要採取的戰術。

sentences.english: Intricately carved latticed windows in the courtyard of a Heshun family home.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲和順庭院裏普通家庭住宅上雕刻精緻的格子窗。

sentences.english: The vehemence of the earth is thick actually amiable, the gentleman should increase thick virtue and permit to carry creation.
sentences.chinese: 大地的氣勢厚實和順，君子應增厚美德，容載萬物。

Changshou suburban district of Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before
variant of 淳樸|淳朴[chun2 pu3]
Bo'ai county in Jiaozuo 焦作[Jiao1 zuo4], Henan
